content:
[TIMELINE]
[EVENT date="v3.6 (≈1.5 years ago)" open]
Interact indicator; new blocks (smooth, curve wedge, slab); randomized terrain map.
[/EVENT]
[EVENT date="v3.87 (≈1.3 years ago)"]
Challenge Mode (10 levels), credits on main menu, thruster velocity fixes.
[/EVENT]
[EVENT date="v3.92 (≈11 months ago)"]
Newest confirmed public update (see devlog for details).
[/EVENT]
[/TIMELINE]
